max.description: Maximum values for property values in the tileset. Only applicable for fixed-size numeric element types (integer, floats and `ARRAY`s thereof). Both `min` and `max` arrays have the same length. When `type` is `ARRAY` the length is determined by `componentCount`; otherwise the length is 1. `normalized` property has no effect on array values: they always correspond to the integer values.

min.description: Minimum values for property values in the tileset. Only applicable for fixed-size numeric element types (integer, floats and `ARRAY`s thereof). Both `min` and `max` arrays have the same length. When `type` is `ARRAY` the length is determined by `componentCount`; otherwise the length is 1. `normalized` property has no effect on array values: they always correspond to the integer values.

occurrences.description: A dictionary, where each key corresponds to an enum `name` and each value is an array containing the number of occurrences of that enum. Only applicable when `type` or `componentType` is `ENUM`. When `type` is `ARRAY` the length is determined by `componentCount`; otherwise the length is 1.
